com.uber.autodispose.errorprone

Class UseAutoDispose

  • java.lang.Object
    • BugChecker
      • com.uber.autodispose.errorprone.UseAutoDispose

  • public final class UseAutoDispose
extends BugChecker
    Checker for subscriptions not binding to lifecycle in components with lifecycle. Use -XepOpt:TypesWithScope flag to add support for custom types with scope. Use -XepOpt:OverrideScopes to only run the EP check on your custom types with scope. The sample configuration for Conductor: 
    
   -XepOpt:TypesWithScope=com.bluelinelabs.conductor.Controller,android.app.Activity
   -XepOpt:OverrideScopes=

        protected boolean capturedTypeAllowed(Type type,

        Called only when lenient and return type is captured.
        Parameters:
        type - the Type
        state - the VisitorState
        Returns:
